description: The Nine Divines, the primary deities of the Imperial pantheon

effects.effectDescription: Resist <mag>% of magic.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Akatosh?

effects.effectDescription: Attacks, spells, scrolls, shouts and enchantments are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% better against dragons (based on favor with Akatosh).
Praying to Akatosh resets the cooldown of your most recently used shout and power.

tenet.description: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Raise your character level. Absorb dragon souls. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

effects.effectDescription: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Raise your character level. Absorb dragon souls. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Increases your Health by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Arkay?

effects.effectDescription: Regenerate up to <5>% of your maximum Health per second based on missing Health. Can perform <Arkay's> <Rites>.
Revive with full Health upon taking fatal damage. Must pray to use this ability again. Costs <15>% favor.

tenet.description: Slay the undead and their summoners. Perform <Arkay's> <Rites>. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim. Never summon the undead or become one of them.

effects.effectDescription: Slay the undead and their summoners. Perform <Arkay's> <Rites>. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim. Never summon the undead or become one of them.
Prices are <mag>% better.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Dibella?

effects.effectDescription: <Lover's> <Comfort> (gained by sleeping with one's spouse) also improves all skills by <5>%.
Activate a person in combat to make them unequip their items and follow you for <90> seconds. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Persuade others. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Find a new Sybil for my Temple. Pray only in the nude. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

effects.effectDescription: Persuade others. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Find a new Sybil for my Temple. Pray only in the nude. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Increases your Magicka by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Julianos?

effects.effectDescription: Spells cost <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% less to cast (based on favor with Julianos).
Spells and scrolls are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% more effective (based on favor with Julianos).

tenet.description: Master the skills of the Mage. Strive to raise your Magicka. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

effects.effectDescription: Master the skills of the Mage. Strive to raise your Magicka. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Increases your Stamina by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Kynareth?

effects.effectDescription: The fierce spirit of Kyne increases movement speed by <mag>% in combat.
Pray to Kynareth to summon a sacred Sabre Cat mount.

tenet.description: Explore new locations. Strive to raise your Stamina. Receive the Voice of the Sky. Pray only outdoors. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

effects.effectDescription: Explore new locations. Strive to raise your Stamina. Receive the Voice of the Sky. Pray only outdoors. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Restoration spells cost <mag>% less to cast.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Mara?

effects.effectDescription: Increases your health regeneration by <1>. Pray to Mara to cure all diseases affecting you or allies within <40> feet.
Living allies within <mag> feet are healed <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional> points per second (based on favor with Mara).

tenet.description: Be married. Own one or more houses. Be generous to beggars and children. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

effects.effectDescription: Be married. Own one or more houses. Be generous to beggars and children. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Block <mag>% more damage.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Stendarr?

effects.effectDescription: Take <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% less attack damage from daedra and undead (based on favor with Stendarr).

effects.effectName: Drain Favor on Summon Undead or Daedra

effects.effectDescription: During prayer, you may spend <10>% favor to gain <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% improved attack, defense and healing (based on favor with Stendarr) for <60> minutes or <5> battles.

tenet.description: Clear dungeons of evil. Slay daedra and the undead. Complete side quests. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim. Never practice the foul summoning arts.

effects.effectDescription: Clear dungeons of evil. Slay daedra and the undead. Complete side quests. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim. Never practice the foul summoning arts.
Time between shouts is reduced.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Talos?

effects.effectDescription: Attacks and shouts against elves are increased by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>%, while attacks against all other enemies are increased by half as much (based on favor with Talos).
Your remaining shout cooldown is halved whenever an enemy dies within <mag> feet.

tenet.description: Bring the Civil War to a conclusion. Learn the dragon tongue. Absorb dragon souls. Slay elves and the Thalmor. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

effects.effectDescription: Bring the Civil War to a conclusion. Learn the dragon tongue. Absorb dragon souls. Slay elves and the Thalmor. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Able to improve items <mag>% better.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Zenithar?

effects.effectDescription: Smithing, Alchemy and Enchanting are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% better (based on favor with Zenithar).
Pray to Zenithar to buy and sell items directly.

tenet.description: Invest in stores and merchants. Seek out skill training. Make weapons and armor. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

effects.effectDescription: Invest in stores and merchants. Seek out skill training. Make weapons and armor. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.

description: The Tribunal, the living gods of Morrowind

effects.effectDescription: Increases your Health by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Almalexia?

effects.effectDescription: Attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage to Nords and Argonians (based on favor with Almalexia).
Healing from all sources is <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more effective (based on favor with Almalexia).

tenet.description: Vanquish the threats facing Solstheim. Be generous to beggars and children. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Vanquish the threats facing Solstheim. Be generous to beggars and children. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Increases your Magicka by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Sothal Sil?

effects.effectDescription: Items are enchanted <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% stronger (based on favor with Sotha Sil).
Visit Dwemer ruins while worshipping Sotha Sil to gain favor.
Using a filled soul gem or dynamo core, permanently summon a Dwarven automaton to fight for you.  You may only have one active at a time

tenet.description: Uncover the secrets of Dwemer ruins. Create enchanted items. Master the skills of the Mage. Dark Elves and those skilled in Enchanting are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Uncover the secrets of Dwemer ruins. Create enchanted items. Master the skills of the Mage. Dark Elves and those skilled in Enchanting are most deserving of my favor.
Sneak is increased by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Vivec?

effects.effectDescription: Speech and intimidate checks are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% easier (per favor with Vivec)
Your power attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage (based on favor with Vivec).

tenet.description: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Read the stories of others. Defeat epic foes. Dark Elves and those skilled in Speechcraft are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Read the stories of others. Defeat epic foes. Dark Elves and those skilled in Speechcraft are most deserving of my favor.
You are <mag>% more effective with missile weapons.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Auriel?

effects.effectDescription: All skills are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% more efficient (based on favor with Auriel).
Attaining level <100> in a skill improves that skill by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% (based on favor with Auriel).

tenet.description: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Master all skills. Become my Champion at my sacred Chantry. High Elves are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Master all skills. Become my Champion at my sacred Chantry. High Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Carrying capacity increased by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Jephre?

effects.effectDescription: The unbounded spirit of Jephre increases movement speed by <mag>% when out of combat.
Stamina regenerates <25>% faster in combat and <50>% faster out of combat. Praying to Jephre brings clear weather.

tenet.description: Explore new locations. Read the stories of others. Hunt animals. Wood Elves are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Explore new locations. Read the stories of others. Hunt animals. Wood Elves are most deserving of my favor.
<mag>% chance to absorb a hostile spell and recharge your Magicka.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Magnus?

effects.effectDescription: Magicka does not regenerate, but praying rapidly replenishes Magicka. Spells cost <50>% less to cast.
Praying automatically casts the (beneficial self targeted) spells in your hands for no Magicka and they last <Global=WSN_Favor_Global>% longer (based on favor with Magnus).

tenet.description: Practice magic successfully while praying. Safeguard the Eye of Magnus. Create enchanted items.

effects.effectDescription: Practice magic successfully while praying. Safeguard the Eye of Magnus. Create enchanted items.
Potions and poisons you mix are <mag>% stronger.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Phynaster?

effects.effectDescription: Health, Magicka and Stamina regenerate <200>% faster when standing still but <100>% slower when moving.
During prayer, you may teleport back to the last location where you prayed. Costs <2>% favor.

tenet.description: Explore new locations. Find the standing stones of Skyrim. Harvest the fruits of nature. Bretons are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Explore new locations. Find the standing stones of Skyrim. Harvest the fruits of nature. Bretons are most deserving of my favor.
Regenerate <mag>% of your maximum Magicka per second.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Syrabane?

effects.effectDescription: You are more likely to find spell tomes and scrolls on enemies you kill.
Spells cost <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% less to cast (based on favor with Syrabane).

tenet.description: Read books that teach new skills. Study a wide variety of spells. High Elves are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Read books that teach new skills. Study a wide variety of spells. High Elves are most deserving of my favor.
You are <mag>% more effective with two-handed weapons.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Trinimac?

effects.effectDescription: Attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage and critical damage to humans (based on favor with Trinimac).
When praying, you may become ethereal and invulnerable until your next attack. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Slay humans. Defeat epic foes. Never accept Boethiah's blessing or serve her. Those skilled in Two-Handed are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay humans. Defeat epic foes. Never accept Boethiah's blessing or serve her. Those skilled in Two-Handed are most deserving of my favor.
Scrolls are <mag>% more effective.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Xarxes?

effects.effectDescription: If you read a Skill Book while praying, Xarxes grants you an extra Skill Point in that skill.
During prayer, you may ascend in a trance, revealing all characters in a very large radius.

tenet.description: Explore new locations. Read the stories of others. Study a wide variety of spells. Bretons are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Explore new locations. Read the stories of others. Study a wide variety of spells. Bretons are most deserving of my favor.
Alteration spells cost <mag>% less to cast.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Z'en?

effects.effectDescription: Beneficial potions, food and ingredients last <50>% longer and are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% better (based on favor with Z'en).
Pray to open an unlimited extradimensional storage space.

tenet.description: Bribe people as needed. Harvest the fruits of nature. Eat as much food as you want. Those skilled in Speech are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Bribe people as needed. Harvest the fruits of nature. Eat as much food as you want. Those skilled in Speech are most deserving of my favor.

description: The Daedric Princes, powerful entities of Oblivion

effects.effectDescription: Resist <mag>% of magic.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Azura?

effects.effectDescription: Foes within <mag> feet suffer <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% reduced magic resistance (based on favor with Azura) and can't absorb spells.
Activate a person in combat below <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% Health (based on favor with Azura) to paralyze them with <1> Health. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Trap souls in my name. Explore new locations. Pray only at twilight, preferably outside. Dark Elves and those skilled in Illusion are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Trap souls in my name. Explore new locations. Pray only at twilight, preferably outside. Dark Elves and those skilled in Illusion are most deserving of my favor.
You are <mag>% more effective with one-handed weapons.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Boethiah?

effects.effectDescription: Your attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage when fighting only one opponent (based on favor with Boethiah).
During prayer, you may invoke superior Daedric Invisibility for <90> seconds. If broken by a sneak attack, it deals <25>% more damage. Costs <10>% favor.

tenet.description: Murder the innocent. Slay people who stand in your way. Strike unseen with sneak attacks. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Murder the innocent. Slay people who stand in your way. Strike unseen with sneak attacks. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Conjuration spells cost <mag>% less to cast.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Clavicus Vile?

effects.effectDescription: Conjuration spells and effects last <10>% longer. Pray to make a <Pact> to gain favor with Clavicus Vile.
Pray to make a <Wish>, permanently gaining an additional perk point. Costs <30>% favor.

tenet.description: Pray to accept a Pact and complete it as written within the allotted time. Never break or ignore my Pacts.

effects.effectDescription: Pray to accept a Pact and complete it as written within the allotted time. Never break or ignore my Pacts.
Spells and effects you cast on yourself last <mag>% longer.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Hermaeus Mora?

effects.effectDescription: Find <Eldritch> <Pages> on corpses. Similar <Eldritch> <Pages> can be bound at a tanning rack to create <Eldritch> <Tomes> that improve magic and shouts.
Pray to permanently raise a skill of your choice by one level. Costs <10>% favor.

tenet.description: Read <Eldritch> <Pages> and bind them into <Eldritch> <Tomes>. Read books that teach new skills. Become my Champion at the Summit of Apocrypha.

effects.effectDescription: Read <Eldritch> <Pages> and bind them into <Eldritch> <Tomes>. Read books that teach new skills. Become my Champion at the Summit of Apocrypha.
Regenerate <mag>% of your maximum Stamina per second.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Hircine?

effects.effectDescription: Hircine's gift doubles attack damage to living targets with <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% or less Health (based on favor with Hircine).
During prayer, invoke a <Hunt> against the living within <500> feet, revealing them and exposing them to <Bitter> <Mercy>. Costs <10>% favor.

tenet.description: Slay the living in open combat, especially those stronger than you. Live as a werewolf. Pray in the wild. Those skilled in Light Armor are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay the living in open combat, especially those stronger than you. Live as a werewolf. Pray in the wild. Those skilled in Light Armor are most deserving of my favor.
Deal <mag>% more attack damage and critical damage against daedra.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Jyggalag?

effects.effectDescription: Generates <8> <Obelisks> <of> <Order> in Skyrim. Activating one grants <15> points of Health, Magicka and Stamina.
Activate an opponent in combat to trap them in an inert but invulnerable state for <15> seconds. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Activate my Obelisks of Order. Clear dungeons of evil. Slay daedra. Never serve Sheogorath. Those skilled in Heavy Armor are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Activate my Obelisks of Order. Clear dungeons of evil. Slay daedra. Never serve Sheogorath. Those skilled in Heavy Armor are most deserving of my favor.
Your power attacks cost <mag>% less Stamina.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Malacath?

effects.effectDescription: Your power attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage (based on favor with Malacath).
When an enemy dies within <mag> feet, their killer is healed by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global>% of the amount of overkill damage dealt (based on favor with Malacath).

tenet.description: Defeat epic foes. Improve weapons and armor. Never commit a crime against the strongholds. Orcs and those skilled in Smithing are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Defeat epic foes. Improve weapons and armor. Never commit a crime against the strongholds. Orcs and those skilled in Smithing are most deserving of my favor.
Destruction spells are <mag>% more effective.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Mehrunes Dagon?

effects.effectDescription: Daedric fire burns your spirit as you pray, draining Magicka. Stop praying at <20>% or less to gain more favor and <Burning Path> activations.

Nearby foes burn for <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3> damage and explode on death for <Global=WSN_Favor_Global> damage (based on favor with Mehrunes Dagon). Pray to recharge. (Activations: <Global=WSN_Effect_Global_MehrunesExplodes>/<Global=WSN_Effect_Global_MehrunesExplodesMax>)

tenet.description: Slay people who stand in your way. Defile the shrines of my enemies. Those skilled in Destruction are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay people who stand in your way. Defile the shrines of my enemies. Those skilled in Destruction are most deserving of my favor.
Poisons you mix are <mag>% more effective.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Mephala?

effects.effectDescription: Sneak attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage from behind (based on favor with Mephala).
During prayer, seize control of the nearest person within <75> feet to fight for you. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Poison your weapons. Strike unseen with sneak attacks. Intimidate the weak. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Poison your weapons. Strike unseen with sneak attacks. Intimidate the weak. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Restoration spells are <10>% more effective.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Meridia?

effects.effectDescription: Attacks, spells, scrolls, shouts and enchantments are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% better against undead (based on favor with Meridia).
Activate an undead opponent in combat to call down a solar strike to deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2> damage (based on favor with Meridia) and half to nearby undead. Costs <10>% favor.

tenet.description: Slay the undead. Never summon the undead or become one of them. High Elves and those skilled in Restoration are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay the undead. Never summon the undead or become one of them. High Elves and those skilled in Restoration are most deserving of my favor.
Destruction spells cost <mag>% less to cast.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Molag Bal?

effects.effectDescription: Absorbs <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional> Magicka and Stamina per second (based on favor with Molag Bal) from nearby enemies in combat.

effects.effectName: Drain Favor on Stop Being Vampire

effects.effectDescription: Activate a hostile below level 50 in combat to banish them to Coldharbour. Pray to request the items. Costs <25>% favor.

tenet.description: Slay people who stand in your way. Trap souls in my name. Live as a vampire and never seek a cure. Those skilled in Destruction are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay people who stand in your way. Trap souls in my name. Live as a vampire and never seek a cure. Those skilled in Destruction are most deserving of my favor.
Increases Disease Resistance by <mag>%.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Namira?

effects.effectDescription: Reduces Poison Resist of all within <mag> feet by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% (based on favor with Namira).

Poisoning a person or putting a Human Heart or Flesh into their inventory attracts insects, reducing armor by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global> and dealing <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3> disease damage (based on favor with Namira).

tenet.description: Murder the innocent. Poison your weapons. Eat the corpses of the dead with my Ring. Be generous to beggars.

effects.effectDescription: Murder the innocent. Poison your weapons. Eat the corpses of the dead with my Ring. Be generous to beggars.
You are <mag>% harder to detect.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Nocturnal?

effects.effectDescription: Praying clears non-violent crime bounties up to <Global=WSN_Favor_Global> gold (based on favor with Nocturnal).
During the night, you are less likely to be detected and are more proficient with picking pockets. During prayer, you may astrally observe the nearest person within <300> feet.

tenet.description: Pickpocket <Mysterious> <Coinpurses>. Pick locks successfully. Pray only at night, preferably in darkness. Those skilled in Sneak are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Pickpocket <Mysterious> <Coinpurses>. Pick locks successfully. Pray only at night, preferably in darkness. Those skilled in Sneak are most deserving of my favor.
Increases Poison Resistance by <mag>%.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Peryite?

effects.effectDescription: All skills are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% more efficient (based on favor with Peryite). Pray for <Peryite's> <Gifts> to gain favor.
Activate a living opponent in combat to inflict all of <Peryite's> <Gifts> you have on the target, plus <5> disease damage per second for each gift. Pray to recharge.

tenet.description: Catch as many diseases as you can. Accept my Gifts of pestilence. Pray only while diseased. Never accept a cure for your afflictions.

effects.effectDescription: Catch as many diseases as you can. Accept my Gifts of pestilence. Pray only while diseased. Never accept a cure for your afflictions.
Using beneficial potions and alchemical ingredients is <mag>% better.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Sanguine?

effects.effectDescription: Health, Magicka and Stamina regenerate <mag>% faster while a potion, food item or ingredient is active.
Can pray in combat, forcing the <5> nearest hostile people to dance for <20> seconds. Costs <10>% favor.

tenet.description: Make mischief and commit misdemeanors and crimes worthy of a bounty. Indulge in mead, wine and ale. Find your own way out of jail.

effects.effectDescription: Make mischief and commit misdemeanors and crimes worthy of a bounty. Indulge in mead, wine and ale. Find your own way out of jail.
Grants a random blessing!

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Sheogorath?

effects.effectDescription: Praying grants a random <Touch> <of> <Madness>. High favor with Sheogorath yields more beneficial effects.
Receive a <Touch> <of> <Madness> whenever you enter combat.

tenet.description: Pray often and receive Sheogorath's <Touch> <of> <Madness>. Never disrespect cheese.

effects.effectDescription: Pray often and receive Sheogorath's <Touch> <of> <Madness>. Never disrespect cheese.
Illusion spells cost <mag>% less to cast.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Vaermina?

effects.effectDescription: Mind affecting illusion spells work on targets <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional> levels higher and cost <50>% less magicka while out of combat (based on favor with Vaermina).
Activate a sleeping person to summon an illusion to accompany you for an hour. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Witness the death of those under your mind affecting spells. Kill people in their sleep. Sleep to pray. Those skilled in Illusion are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Witness the death of those under your mind affecting spells. Kill people in their sleep. Sleep to pray. Those skilled in Illusion are most deserving of my favor.
Pickpocketing is <mag>% easier.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Baan Dar?

effects.effectDescription: Selling to fences is <Global=WSN_Favor_Global>% more lucrative. Pickpocketing is <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% easier (based on favor with Baan Dar).
Put skooma bottles in people's inventory, then pray to Baan Dar to ignite them within <200> feet for <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional4> damage (based on favor with Baan Dar). Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Pick locks and pockets successfully. Khajiit and those skilled in Archery are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Pick locks and pockets successfully. Khajiit and those skilled in Archery are most deserving of my favor.
Armor rating of heavy armor pieces is increased by <mag>%.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Ebonarm?

effects.effectDescription: Attacks and critical strikes are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% more effective against daedra and those who summon them (based on favor with Ebonarm).
Reduces the armor of enemies within <mag> feet by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2> points (based on favor with Ebonarm) and you gain the total amount. Doubled against daedra.

tenet.description: Slay daedra. Defeat epic foes. Complete miscellaneous quests for the people of Skyrim. Those skilled in Block are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay daedra. Defeat epic foes. Complete miscellaneous quests for the people of Skyrim. Those skilled in Block are most deserving of my favor.
Conjuration spells are <mag>% more effective.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Mannimarco?

effects.effectDescription: Undead conjured at night last <Global=WSN_Favor_Global>% longer (based on favor with Mannimarco).
Allied conjured undead deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% more attack damage and regenerate Health (based on favor with Mannimarco).

tenet.description: Trap souls in my name. Pray only at night. Never accept Arkay's blessing. Those skilled in Conjuration are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Trap souls in my name. Pray only at night. Never accept Arkay's blessing. Those skilled in Conjuration are most deserving of my favor.
Armor rating of light armor pieces is increased by <mag>%.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Sai?

effects.effectDescription: When meditating, able to bet some of your gold on a game of dice.
Staking <1000> gold or more on a game of dice also adds <1> point of Health, Magicka or Stamina to your wager.

tenet.description: Gamble while meditating and win.

effects.effectDescription: Gamble while meditating and win.
Deal <mag>% more attack damage and critical damage against elves.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Shor?

effects.effectDescription: Take <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% less attack damage and stagger from elves (based on favor with Shor).
When entering combat with a mighty foe, Shor sends a Shield-Thane to assist you. Pray to recharge.

tenet.description: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Master the skills of the Warrior. Slay elves. Defeat epic foes.

effects.effectDescription: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Master the skills of the Warrior. Slay elves. Defeat epic foes.
Sneak attacks deal <mag>% more damage.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Sithis?

effects.effectDescription: Up to <25>% harder to detect by those within <30> feet. Chance to find Human Hearts on people you kill.
While sneaking, activate a door to briefly turn it into a Void portal. Targets within <60> feet who are not detecting you are pulled in and killed. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Murder the innocent. Pray while sacrificing a Human Heart or Human Flesh. Send your victims to the Void. Argonians are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Murder the innocent. Pray while sacrificing a Human Heart or Human Flesh. Send your victims to the Void. Argonians are most deserving of my favor.
Followers within <mag> feet gain <50> points of armor and <10>% magic resistance.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship St. Alessia?

effects.effectDescription: Pray for a Divine blessing of your choice. Divine blessings are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% better (based on favor with St. Alessia).
While under the effects of a Divine blessing, can talk to most non-hostile humans to make them a friend and potential follower. Costs <10>% favor.

tenet.description: Have a follower at your side. Slay elves. Receive the blessing of a Divine.

effects.effectDescription: Have a follower at your side. Slay elves. Receive the blessing of a Divine.
Deal <mag>% more attack damage and critical damage against animals.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship the All-Maker?

effects.effectDescription: Healing spells restore <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more Health (based on favor with the All-Maker).
After using an All-Maker Stone power, pray to the All-Maker to have it restored to you.

tenet.description: Cleanse the All-Maker Stones. Hunt animals. Explore new locations. Pray only outdoors. Nords are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Cleanse the All-Maker Stones. Hunt animals. Explore new locations. Pray only outdoors. Nords are most deserving of my favor.
Tough scales increase armor by <mag> points.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship the Hist?

effects.effectDescription: Pray to gain a <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2> point bonus to Stamina and Magicka for <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional4> seconds (based on favor with the Hist).
Absorb <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% of the Magicka and Stamina of dead creatures and people within <mag> feet (based on favor with the Hist).

tenet.description: Explore new locations. Slay daedra. Pray only outdoors. Never summon a daedra.

effects.effectDescription: Explore new locations. Slay daedra. Pray only outdoors. Never summon a daedra.
Alteration spells are <10>% more effective.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship the Magna-Ge?

effects.effectDescription: Gain <mag> points of weapon charge per second, up to their charge level when last equipped or recharged.
During prayer, you may let the Magna-Ge carry you to a location within line of sight. Costs <4>% favor.

tenet.description: Create enchanted items. Explore new locations. Pray only outdoors at night. High Elves and those skilled in Alteration are most deserving of our favor.

effects.effectDescription: Create enchanted items. Explore new locations. Pray only outdoors at night. High Elves and those skilled in Alteration are most deserving of our favor.
Armor rating of light armor pieces is increased by <mag>%.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Leki?

effects.effectDescription: Power attacks ignore <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% of an opponent's armor (based on favor with Leki).
During prayer, you may spend <5>% favor to gain <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% melee damage (based on favor with Leki) for <60> minutes or <10> battles. Costs <5>% favor.

tenet.description: Bring the Civil War to a conclusion. Make and improve weapons. Master the skills of the Warrior.

effects.effectDescription: Bring the Civil War to a conclusion. Make and improve weapons. Master the skills of the Warrior.
Healing spells restore <mag>% more Health.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Morwha?

effects.effectDescription: Meditation restores <Global=WSN_Favor_Global> Health per second for you and nearby allies (based on favor with Morwha).
Praying to Morwha blesses you with enchanted fruit that restores or fortifies an attribute.

tenet.description: Be married. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Harvest the fruits of nature. Eat as much food as you want.

effects.effectDescription: Be married. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Harvest the fruits of nature. Eat as much food as you want.
Regenerate <mag>% of your maximum Health per second.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Satakal?

effects.effectDescription: Shrine blessings from other gods are more effective and last longer (based on favor with Satakal).
Pray to become reborn as a different person, moving points between your attributes. Costs <15>% favor.

tenet.description: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Strive to raise your Health. Absorb dragon souls.

effects.effectDescription: Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Strive to raise your Health. Absorb dragon souls.
Items are enchanted <mag>% stronger.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Tall Papa?

effects.effectDescription: Weapon enchantments drain <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% less charge (based on favor with Tall Papa).
On death, enter an ethereal ascended state. If combat ends within <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3> seconds, brings you back to life (based on favor with Tall Papa) for <5>% favor. Pray to reset.

tenet.description: Touch the <Fractures> scattered around Skyrim. Create enchanted items. Those skilled in Enchanting are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Touch the <Fractures> scattered around Skyrim. Create enchanted items. Those skilled in Enchanting are most deserving of my favor.
Stagger from attacks and bashes is <mag>% more effective.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship the HoonDing?

effects.effectDescription: Staggering an opponent reduces armor by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2> points for <30> seconds (based on favor with the HoonDing).
Grants immunity to stagger from attacks and bashes.

tenet.description: Slay your foes in open combat, especially those stronger than you. Those skilled in One-Handed are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay your foes in open combat, especially those stronger than you. Those skilled in One-Handed are most deserving of my favor.
Lockpicking is <mag>% easier.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Rajhin?

effects.effectDescription: Find additional gold in many containers, with a chance to find a large amount of additional gold.
Pray to Rajhin to break a lock within <20> feet. Costs <5>% favor. No effect on locks that can't be picked.

tenet.description: Explore new locations. Bribe people as needed. Pick locks successfully. Those skilled in Lockpicking are most deserving of my favor.

effects.effectDescription: Explore new locations. Bribe people as needed. Pick locks successfully. Those skilled in Lockpicking are most deserving of my favor.
Unarmed strikes do <mag> additional damage.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Riddle'Thar?

effects.effectDescription: All skills are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% more efficient (based on favor with the Riddle'Thar).
During prayer, an ancient Mane will grant a blessing they believe to be appropriate for the challenges you are about to face.

tenet.description: Master the skills of the Warrior, Thief and Mage. Strive to raise your Health, Magicka and Stamina. Each is as important as the others. Pray only at night.

effects.effectDescription: Master the skills of the Warrior, Thief and Mage. Strive to raise your Health, Magicka and Stamina. Each is as important as the others. Pray only at night.
Deal <mag>% more attack damage and critical damage against animals.

effects.effectName: Do you want to worship Totems?

effects.effectDescription: Pray while sacrificing <100> gold worth of gemstones to assume the powers of an <animal> <god>.
Able to assume the powers of the <Dragon>. Costs <2>% favor per hour.

tenet.description: Slay people who stand in your way. Absorb dragon souls. Assume our powers through prayer. Nords are most deserving of our favor.

effects.effectDescription: Slay people who stand in your way. Absorb dragon souls. Assume our powers through prayer. Nords are most deserving of our favor.
